alert.note: Alert for Inland Worcester; Maryland Beaches (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 10:47AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN WORCESTER COUNTY THROUGH 1115 AM EDT... At 1046 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cape Isle Of Wight, or over Ocean City, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Ocean Pines around 1050 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Bishop, West Ocean City, Showell, Ocean City Municipality, and Bishopville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
